items.summary: TaskUs Merchant Smiley Sprint — Week 2 of 4. Sprint kicked off Feb 9, daily standups running since Feb 10. Weekly deep dive was yesterday (Feb 16). Check progress on top 5 decline drivers and path to 80%.
Badging Weekly Update today at 9:30pm — Elevate Content Build progress with Julia Donahue, Kaytee Jordan, Clinton Morin
Coachy: No updates or fixes until full-stack app build completes — Jennifer Routledge flagged this dependency. Monitor #temp-help-support-performance-portal
Elevate Content Build: Hilary comment on doc asking Kaytee Jordan and Julia Donahue to validate content — check if they've responded
Money Optimization: Rory Devitt prepping Vault proposal revamp — check status of Money scope doc and IHC clean-up scoping
Week 3 (Feb 13-19): Playbook sections 6-9 due this week + publish V1 to Vault. Check progress with Mark Roche.
Translation Quality: Week 3 milestone is 'Analyze vendor quality scores'. Manssur commented (Feb 2) he hopes to move up SLT recommendations by 1 week — check if scores received and analysis started.

Multilingual Dashboard: Week 3 milestone is 'January readout/readout agent'. Manssur noted (Feb 2) Kate was making improvements. Optional: Jan analysis for all languages could be done end of Week 2/3.

China Exporter Content: Week 3 milestone is 'Engage Trust & Safety for China/HK'. Dena Nguyen asked (Feb 6) about Germany content — 'Is the goal to update Selling in Germany HC content like we did for China?' Germany content starts Week 4 (Feb 20).

WS6/WS7: Elevate infra migrated to monorepo this weekend (Feb 16) — elevate.shopify.io now on new infra. But local dev issues (Ben) and BigQuery-to-Vault migration still pending. Coachy updates remain blocked until full feature build completes.
WS3: Jerie Shaw joining workstream brain mash today 5:30pm — Zendesk redesign discussion impacts MF teams and WS5 Money Optimization
WS4: MV pilot scope published — Mission Control pilot overlaps with WS5 coaching/proficiency goals. Verify start date in #1-merchant-verification-workstream.
P0 assigned to you: Executive Escalations Tool Build & Data (IR) — GH #5962
P0 assigned to you: Beacon Code Changes for Advisor Acceleration — Data request, GH #6136
P1 assigned to you: Internal Live Assist for Shop Closures — prevent termination by BPO advisors, GH #5854
P2 assigned to you: Create Support intake pathway for non-support teams (Money MF) — GH #7034
P2 assigned to you: Reduce incorrect escalations to #shopify-tax-rnd (Money MF) — GH #6727
Older issue assigned to you: Analysis of Support Volume Deflection for Top Apps — GH #5052, may be stale (Aug 2025)
Legacy accounts settings migration (GH #7096) — on Support Ops board as P1, finding owner for readiness assessment

Latest weekly round-up is from Feb 6 (11 days ago): Dev Support merged boards, MV pilot scope published, Retail Verifone kickoff, Money prepping proposal revamp. Feb 13 submissions were requested — check if the new round-up has been compiled.
Live Assist update (Feb 12): Sladjana posted updated best practices for chat takeovers — sent to Frontline Leadership for distribution
Courtney Jamieson flagged (last week): LA feedback form post-takeover is different from consult — monitoring quality gap
AHT temporarily removed from Alerts (announced ~Feb 10) to focus on Merchant Smiley coaching — will reassess after Full Stack App launch (Jason Armstrong)
Mark Roche DM: Offered to share his start-of-day prompt — says it stems from PSN Brain install for memory
Fellow bot: 38 unread messages — likely meeting notes and agenda items for today's meetings
#shopify-tax-rnd: 1 mention — may relate to GH #6727 (reduce incorrect escalations)
OVERDUE: Loop back to Dev/Partners thread about routing issue (due Feb 13)
OVERDUE (Aug 2025): Jenn Fantin DM about Guru contract meeting — you were OOO, align on what was decided
OVERDUE (Aug 2025): Anusha Shanmugarajah — knowledge policies loop-close and Tier 2 collab follow-up
CCMA Sponsor Members Forum invite — Onshoring vs Offshoring, Thu Feb 19 in Dundalk
MaestroQA: 'What Surveys Miss — Leadership Moments That Shape CX' — last call webinar from Larrita Browning
3:30pm — Support Operations Team Sync (Hackdays Special!) with Murdo, Ben, Mundeep, Amanda
items.prep: Hack Days 39 is this week. Your team's hack project is 'Getting our GAS out of Appsheet'. Team is active — Mark Roche having laptop issues (black screen), Siobhan asking about favourite Cursor models, Rory out for appointment until 1pm. Mundeep just came online. Check Fellow notes for pre-set agenda items. This is a lighter sync given Hack Days — good time to check in on morale and who's participating in hacks vs regular work.

items.summary: 4:00pm — TaskUs Merchant Smiley Sprint daily standup (WS5, Week 2) with Jennifer Routledge, Jason Armstrong, Arianna Gordon + TaskUs team
items.prep: Week 2 of 4-week sprint. Kickoff was Feb 9, daily standups since Feb 10, first weekly deep dive was yesterday (Feb 16). TaskUs handles 70% of Core Merchant volume. Smiley dropped from 82.4% (Nov) to 77.6% (Feb MTD). Goal: get back to 80%. Key context from Sladjana's PE update (Feb 10): Merchant Smiley rejection rate ~80%, Live Assist chat volume up 232 (210 takeovers), shipping topics dragging smiley down, 27 tickets with 4+ min specialist wait time. Bottom performers identified across squads. Jason Armstrong removed AHT from Alerts to focus coaching on Smiley. Ask: What progress on the top 5 action areas since kickoff? Any early wins or blockers surfaced in daily standups? What came out of yesterday's weekly deep dive?

items.summary: 4:30pm — Hilary / Katie McConnell - Escalated MF Sync
items.prep: Katie's recent updates: (1) Sonar feedback improvements shipped with Kayla Busch — can now filter by Escalated teams. (2) Sonal Kumar reviewing oldest open tickets, found some need dev team escalation — she started a list doc. Sonal wants to discuss best approach for getting traction across different teams. (3) Sladjana flagged: SSAs supporting shipping topics may be contributing to smiley dip, and 27 tickets had 4+ min wait for specialist first reply in consults. Ask Katie: How is the Sonar filter helping identify patterns? What's the plan for the stale ticket escalation list?

items.summary: 5:30pm — Jerie Shaw / Hilary - Workstream brain mash
items.prep: Cross-workstream alignment session. Key crossover points to raise: (1) WS6/WS7 Elevate build is blocking WS5 Coachy updates — no fixes until full-stack app ships. (2) WS4 MV pilot scope published — Mission Control pilot overlaps WS5 coaching/proficiency goals (verify start date). (3) WS11 China/HK content may need WS4 MV readiness input. (4) WS9 new financial products could overlap WS5 Money Optimization and WS11 international expansion. Bring: your list of dependencies and blockers between workstreams to map out the critical path.

items.summary: 7:00pm — Support Delivery MBR with SLT
items.prep: Monthly Business Review with senior delivery leadership (Amy Lafleche, Allison Sadler, Jennifer Routledge, Colin Boyer, Peter Gregory + all delivery leads). Review the slide deck before the meeting. Key things to have ready: (1) WS5 progress update — Smiley Sprint in Week 2, AHT removed from alerts (~Feb 10), coaching framework status. (2) WS11 progress — Playbook V1 due this week, translation quality baseline. (3) Multifecta health — 2 P0 issues open (Exec Escalations tool, Beacon code changes), Elevate infra migrated this weekend, MV pilot scope published (verify start date). (4) TaskUs Smiley decline trajectory — sprint is in Week 2, first weekly deep dive was yesterday. Be prepared to speak to blockers and cross-workstream dependencies.

items.summary: 8:30pm — Shipping & Markets Multifecta Sync with Elissa Unrau, Shahnaz Arab, Christie Finlayson, Erinn Moore
items.prep: Recent activity: (1) New intake issue: FedEx BYOA Migration (GH #7081). (2) Shahnaz started UPS training material, asked Natasha about SSA training timeline. (3) Shahnaz's team doing a Hack Days project: Support Tools. (4) New members Andrew Iozzo and Mandy Daniels joined the channel. (5) Elissa asked Natasha about Shipping helper scheduling for coming weeks. (6) Weekly round-up reminder went out but no submission yet from this team — chase this. Ask: Status of FedEx BYOA migration intake, UPS training readiness timeline, and whether weekly update was submitted.

items.summary: 9:30pm — Badging Weekly Update (WS5 Elevate) with Julia Donahue, Kaytee Jordan, Clinton Morin
items.prep: Major Elevate milestone: Pierre-Luc shipped the URL swap to monorepo infrastructure over the weekend. elevate.shopify.io now points to new infra on world monorepo. Remaining issue: BigQuery access for user info needs Vault API migration (medium priority, doesn't break app). Ben having local Prisma issues after fresh checkout. Rich Brown praised the team: 'proper software — millions of dollars not long ago'. Jill Wise demoed test store work with CSVs ready for import. Ask: Is the DNS swap fully propagated? Any blockers for content badging work now that infra is migrated? What's the content review status from Kaytee and Julia?

items.summary: Hack Days 39 is this week — #temp-support-at-hackdays-39 active. Your team's hack project: 'Getting our GAS out of Appsheet'
Support Advisor Assistant launched by Dawid — second brain tool for live chats, shared in #frontline-all-in
